mage.Core
Class Merlin

java.lang.Object
  mage.Core.Merlin

public class Merlin
extends java.lang.Object

Merlin is a tool for optimizing Multiplexed Automated Genome Engineering oligo selection. The tool is designed taking into consideration Harris Wang's optMage tool as well as the oligo pool considerations.

Author:
Samir Ahmed

Constructor Detail

Merlin

public Merlin(java.lang.String directory,
              java.lang.String targetsFileName,
              java.lang.String parametersFileName,
              java.lang.String genomeFileName)
       throws java.lang.Exception
Constructor for Merlin: Returns an Merlin object that can be run

Parameters:
directory - the working directory, which must have all the following files
targetsFileName - the targets file, which must follow the optMage input target format
parametersFileName - the parameters file, which must follow the optMage input param format
genomeFileName - A fasta or ffn file
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - In the event a file cannot be loaded/ parsed correctly, an exception will be thrown

public void verbose(boolean enable)

compareToOptMage

public void compareToOptMage(java.lang.String filename)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
Will search Merlin's working environment for optMage's output Oligo file Will then find the corresponding oligos in the oligo folder, and save the corresponding shift position

Parameters:
filename - the filename under which the desired optMage file is positioned
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - Throws an exception if there is a problem with the IO, for instance no file is found, or data in unparseable

generateGenbank

public java.util.List<java.lang.String> generateGenbank()
Returns a String in Genbank format for displaying in Mage-Editor The file will feature markings and the span of the oligo

Returns:
Genbank string

loadConfig

private void loadConfig(java.lang.String workingdirectory)
                 throws java.io.IOException
Helper function to load configuration text file. This file show be of the following format

____________________________

blastn < binary_path >

makeblastdb < binary_path >

MFOLD < binary_path >

Parameters:
workingdirectory - Constants.workingdirectory
Throws:
java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be read and parsed correctly
